channel.title: Claire Morandin on Luke Holman
channel.description: Recent content in Claire Morandin on Luke Holman

item.title: Researchers collaborate with same-gendered colleagues more often than expected across the life sciences
item.description: We find that researchers tend to co-publish with same-gendered colleagues, and that this tendency is presently increasing. We found no evidence that senior academics drive this pattern, or that the pattern is stronger in fields where women are in the minority. Interestingly, journals with a high impact factor for their discipline tended to have comparatively many mixed-gender teams.
